response.json is the body of the following curl call:
-- req.sh --
curl -v -X POST http://localhost:8000/v1/chat/completions -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{
"model": "llama3.2:1b",
"messages": [
    {
        "role": "user",
        "content": "tell me a joke"
    }
],
"stream": false
}'
-- response.json --
{"id":"chatcmpl-8p5o2kKQvHx0KxVJXfzDKS","object":"chat.completion","created":1716194078,"model":"llama3.2:1b","choices":[{"index":0,"message":{"role":"assistant","content":""},"finish_reason":"stop"}],"usage":{"prompt_tokens":29,"completion_tokens":0,"total_tokens":29}}
